data.eml:eml: A new disjunct species of Eriolaena (Malvaceae, Dombeyoideae) from Continental Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dorr, Laurence J., Wurdack, Kenneth J. (2018): A new disjunct species of Eriolaena (Malvaceae, Dombeyoideae) from Continental Africa. PhytoKeys 111: 11-16, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.111.29303, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.111.29303
